name: Vape Timer : Steeping Assistant
description: Keep track of your DIY e-juices steeping process and make great e-juices.  This app is for vapers who make their own juices only.  Vape Timer allows you to create your own steeping processes and lets you know when your e-juice will be ready.  Features : * Create timer for e-juice in seconds. * Detailed tracking of the steeping progress. * Create template for most used timers and create timer almost instantly * With on time alerting, you dont need to worry about the progress. * Pre-determined or custom processes. * A quick guide for new DIY e-juice beginners.   Getting started to Vape Timer only takes a couple of minutes.   If you have any problem or suggestions please let us know.
